bounties.title: Design a Logo for a Local Bakery
bounties.description: We're opening a new bakery called 'The Rolling Pin' and need a simple, modern logo. We want it to feel warm and friendly. The main elements should be a rolling pin and a wheat stalk. The winner will have their design featured and receive full credit!

bounties.title: Analyze Customer Feedback Spreadsheet
bounties.description: We have an Excel sheet with 100 rows of customer feedback. We need someone to use basic Excel functions or PivotTables to identify the top 3 most common complaints and create a simple bar chart visualizing the frequency of each complaint.

bounties.title: Write a Python Script to Organize Files
bounties.description: Create a simple Python script that sorts files in a directory into sub-folders based on their file extension (e.g., all '.jpg' files into an 'Images' folder, all '.pdf' files into a 'Documents' folder). The script should be well-commented.

bounties.title: Create a Social Media Post Template
bounties.description: Design a reusable Instagram post template in Canva or Figma for our weekly 'Skill of the Week' feature. The template should be eye-catching and have placeholders for a title, a short description, and an icon.
